created: {{currentDate}}
tags:
  - project/{{projectSlug}}
  - type/instructions
---
# {{projectName}} - Project Instructions

## Project Information
- **Name**: {{projectName}}
- **Type**: {{projectType}}
- **Description**: {{description}}
- **Created**: {{currentDate}}

## Stakeholders
{{stakeholderList}}

## Workflow Guidelines

### 1. Daily Work Sessions
- Start by reading [[CLAUDE.md]] for context
- Log all work in [[{{projectName}} - Implementation Log]]
- Update project status in [[{{projectName}} - INDEX]]
- Create meeting notes in Meetings/ folder

### 2. Architecture & Design
- Document all technical decisions in Architecture/
- Use ADR (Architecture Decision Record) format
- Link decisions from [[CLAUDE.md]]

### 3. Requirements Management
- Track all requirements in Requirements/
- Link requirements to implementation tasks
- Update status as requirements evolve

### 4. File Naming Conventions
- Meeting notes: `YYYY-MM-DD {{projectName}} - [Meeting Type].md`
- Architecture docs: `{{projectName}} - [Component/Decision].md`
- Requirements: `{{projectName}} - [Feature/Epic].md`

### 5. Tagging Strategy
- Always include: `project/{{projectSlug}}`
- Phase tags: `phase/planning`, `phase/development`, etc.
- Type tags: `type/meeting`, `type/architecture`, etc.
- Status tags: `status/active`, `status/blocked`, etc.

### 6. Cross-Linking
- Link all project files back to [[{{projectName}} - INDEX]]
- Reference decisions in [[CLAUDE.md]]
- Connect requirements to implementation

### 7. Progress Tracking
- Update phase in frontmatter as project progresses
- Use task lists for actionable items
- Regular status updates in Implementation Log

### 8. Communication
- Document all stakeholder communications
- Track decisions and their rationale
- Maintain change log for major pivots
